name: High School Gangster Bully Boy
description:
Handsome school boy get admission in the high school and enjoy your school life days by making new friends. Be the part of this astounding school game and save yourself from raging terms. Play a vital role as a school boy and make prank with your classmate by dropping the water bucket to your friend and make fun. Be the gangster in school and make funny prank in the chemistry lab with your classmates or make reverse reaction of formula. Multiple tasks to do and recall your school memories or be the hero in high school.

** Main Features**
• Wonderful schoolboy game with multiple addictive tasks to do
• Challenging school boy activities to perform
• Enjoy your school bully life along with classmates
• Addictive pranks perform for chill
